some.short_description: Rajnil is a Partner with the Advisory practice and leads the Go To Market strategy for Generative AI for PwC India. He has nearly 25 years experience in advanced analytics and AI
some.description: Rajnil is a Partner with the Advisory practice and leads the Go To Market strategy for Generative AI for PwC India. He has nearly 25 years experience in advanced analytics and AI and has advised CXOs at the Fortune 1000 and at large privately-held enterprises in North America, UK, Australia, and Asia. His forte is rapid profit improvement through the application of AI-led applications.

categories.name: TECH TALKS
categories.description: Designed to inspire and educate everyone on the latest solutions, frameworks and future prospects across various technologies including Generative AI, LLM, Bots, DevOps, AWS Cloud, Networking, Digital Commerce, UX etc.,

categories.name: SOLUTIONS SPACE
categories.description: Explore the various innovations, best practices and frameworks that our consultants have built as accelerators and solutions to some of the critical problems in the industries that we serve.

categories.name: GUEST TALK - Rajnil Mallik
categories.description: Rajnil is a Partner with the Advisory practice and leads the Go To Market strategy for Generative AI for PwC India. He has nearly 25 years experience in advanced analytics and AI.
